scripts.TEST-COMMENT: pnpm run test : This runs the AUTOMATED TESTS
scripts.LINTING-COMMENT: pnpm run lint : This runs LINTING with automatic fixing enabled (use this if you want to run linting in terminal, but recommended you instead do this in your IDE directly)
scripts.WATCH-COMMENT: pnpm run watch : This runs the WATCH for development, checking for Typescript errors in real time
scripts.START-COMMENT: pnpm run start : START the server
scripts.BUILD-COMMENT: pnpm run build : This runs the BUILD for deployment
scripts.build: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && next build
